info.title: CTS REST API
info.description: Endpoints for p-chem, speciation, and transformation data.

get.description:
This enpoint returns a list of all
calculator endpoints.

This endoint returns the inputs used
for getting p-chem data from chemaxon.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the inputs used to
get estimated values from ChemAxon.

requestBody.description: Inputs for ChemAxon p-chem property request.

post.summary: Run chemaxon calculator for p-chem data.
post.description:
This endpoint runs chemaxon and returns p-chem data
from requested p-chem property.

requestBody.description: Outputs for ChemAxon p-chem property request.

200.description: Run chemaxon calculator for p-chem data.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the outputs used to
get estimated values from ChemAxon.

requestBody.description: Outputs for ChemAxon p-chem property request.

get.description: Returns endpoints for EPI Suite calculator.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the inputs used to
get estimated values from EPI Suite.

requestBody.description: Inputs for EPI Suite p-chem property request.

post.summary: Run epi calculator for p-chem data.
post.description:
This endpoint runs epi and returns p-chem data
from requested p-chem property.

requestBody.description: Outputs for EPI Suite p-chem property request.

200.description: Run epi calculator for p-chem data.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the inputs used to
get estimated values from TEST.

requestBody.description: Inputs for TEST p-chem property request.

post.summary: Run test calculator for p-chem data.
post.description:
This endpoint runs test and returns p-chem data
from requested p-chem property.

requestBody.description: Outputs for TEST p-chem property request.

200.description: Run test calculator for p-chem data.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the inputs used to
get estimated values from TESTWS.

requestBody.description: Inputs for TESTWS p-chem property request.

post.summary: Run test calculator for p-chem data.
post.description:
This endpoint runs test and returns p-chem data
from requested p-chem property.

requestBody.description: Outputs for TESTWS p-chem property request.

200.description: Run test calculator for p-chem data.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the inputs used to
get estimated values from opera.

requestBody.description: Inputs for opera p-chem property request.

post.summary: Run opera calculator for p-chem data.
post.description:
This endpoint runs opera and returns p-chem data
from requested p-chem property.

requestBody.description: Outputs for opera p-chem property request.

200.description: Run opera calculator for p-chem data.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the inputs used to
get estimated values from Measured.

requestBody.description: Inputs for Measured p-chem property request.

post.summary: Run measured calculator for p-chem data.
post.description:
This endpoint runs measured and returns p-chem data
from requested p-chem property.

requestBody.description: Outputs for Measured p-chem property request.

200.description: Run measured calculator for p-chem data.

get.description: This endpoint makes transformation pathways predictions and is a ChemAxon metabolizer library wrapper.

post.description:
This endpoint returns the inputs used to
get estimated values from Metabolizer.

requestBody.description: Inputs for Metabolizer p-chem property request.

post.summary: Run metabolizer calculator for p-chem data.
post.description:
This endpoint runs metabolizer and returns p-chem data
from requested p-chem property.

requestBody.description: Outputs for Metabolizer p-chem property request.

200.description: Run metabolizer calculator for p-chem data.

post.summary: Run envipath calculator for microbial biotransformation data (envipath.org).
post.description: This endpoint runs envipath and returns microbial biotransformation data.

requestBody.description: Outputs for envipath p-chem property request.

200.description: Run envipath calculator for p-chem data.

chemical.description: Chemical to get p-chem data for, can be in smiles, iupac, formula, or name (e.g., aspirin) format

structure.description: Chemical for metabolizer in smiles format.

generationLimit.description: Number of generations for structure's transformation products.

chemical.description: Chemical in smiles, CAS, formula, or IUPAC format.

gen_limit.description: Number of generations for structure's transformation products.

ph.description: pH for pH-dependent p-chem properties, like KOW

calc.description: chemaxon, epi, test, sparc, or measured p-chem calculators.
chemaxon, epi, test, opera, or measured p-chem calculators.
